```
$ awk ' BEGIN { FS=":" } { print $1 } END { print NR } ' /etc/passwd  
```

```
John Doe
15 back street
(123) 455-3584

Mokhtar Ebrahim
10 Museum street
(456) 352-3541  
```

```
Welcome to AWK programming
This is a test line
And this is one more 
```

```
$ awk '
BEGIN{
var="Welcome to AWk programming"
print var
}'
```

```
$ awk '
BEGIN{
var1=2
var2=3
var3=var1+var2
print var3
}'  
```

```
$ awk '
BEGIN{
str1="Welcome "
str2=" To shell scripting"
str3=str1 str2
print str3
}'  
```

```
$ awk '
BEGIN{
var="I love AWK tool"
print $var 
}'
```
